com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans

Class SharedBeanPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.AbstractSharedDataPlatform<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean,IBeanStorage,IBeanQuery,IBeanQueryResult,IBeanCondition,IBeanAction>
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans.SharedBeanPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISharedBeanPlatform, ISharedDataPlatform<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean,IBeanStorage,IBeanQuery,IBeanQueryResult,IBeanCondition,IBeanAction>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMonitoringServer, DistributedApplicationObserver

    public class SharedBeanPlatform
extends AbstractSharedDataPlatform<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean,IBeanStorage,IBeanQuery,IBeanQueryResult,IBeanCondition,IBeanAction>
implements ISharedBeanPlatform
    Extends the generic super class to bind serializable Java objects to the generic types.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                  IBeanStorage dataStorage,
                  IApplicationTopology appTopo,
                  IPhysicalTopologyMonitor physTopoMonitor,
                  IMessageReceiver msgReceiver,
                  boolean enableMonitoring,
                  boolean enablePolicy)
        Create the platform with the given instance data and enable monitoring according to the input flag.
        Parameters:
        appDesc -
        dataStorage - if null, then a new BeanStorage instance is used.
        appTopo - if null, then value is defined by super class (see below).
        physTopoMonitor - if null, then value is defined by super class (see below).
        msgReceiver - if null, then value is defined by super class (see below).
        enableMonitoring - turn on monitoring of this instance using the DebugEventServer, per the super class.
        enablePolicy - turn on policy to control query and other accesses.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of arguments.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                  IBeanStorage dataStorage,
                  IApplicationTopology appTopo,
                  IPhysicalTopologyMonitor physTopoMonitor,
                  IMessageReceiver msgReceiver)
        Create the platform with the given instance data and enable platform monitoring as defined by the super class's constructor
        Parameters:
        appDesc -
        dataStorage - if null, then a new BeanStorage instance is used.
        appTopo - may be null, in which case the super-class defined instance/implementation will be used.
        physTopoMonitor - may be null, in which case the super-class defined instance/implementation will be used.
        msgReceiver - may be null, in which case the super-class defined instance/implementation will be used.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of arguments.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                  IApplicationTopology appTopo,
                  IBeanStorage dataStorage)
        Convenience constructor. Create the instance with the given data and use the default IPhysicalTopologyMonitor and IMessageReceiver as defined by our super class.
        Parameters:
        appDesc - name space and instance id for this instance.
        appTopo - may be null, in which case the default as defined by the super class is used.
        dataStorage - bean storage to be used with this instance. If null, then the default implementation is used.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of other configurable instances.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                  IBeanStorage dataStorage)
        Convenience constructor. Create the instance to use the given data storage and default implementations of other configurables.
        Parameters:
        appDesc - name space and instance id for this instance.
        dataStorage - bean storage to be used with this instance.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of other configurable instances.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(java.lang.String name,
                  IBeanStorage dataStorage)
        Convenience constructor. Create the instance to use the given data storage and default implementations of other configurables.
        Parameters:
        name - the name space assigned to this instance.
        dataStorage - bean storage to be used with this instance. If null, then the default implementation is used.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of other configurable instances.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(java.lang.String appName)
        Convenience constructor. Create the instance to use all the dfault implementations.
        Parameters:
        appName - the name space used by this instance.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of other configurable instances.

      • SharedBeanPlatform

        public SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc)

        Parameters:
        appDesc - name space and instance id for this instance.

        See SharedBeanPlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, IBeanStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for default values of other configurable instances.
